description: "Make Amerika Great Again!" unter diesem Motto möchte Präsident Donald Trump die Vereinigten Staaten zu einem neuen goldenen Zeitalter verhelfen. Dies will er mit einer nach innen ausgerichteten Politik bewerkstelligen. Kurzum: einen enormen Ausbau der Verteidigung und der Rüstungsindustrie sowie Deportationen bis zum Abwinken. Wohin mit den Leuten? Tja...da kommt ihr ins Spiel...
taunt_1: They're eating the dogs; they're eating the cats; they're eateng the pets of the people that life there.
taunt_2: They're killing our people; they're killing our country; they're killing our people; we have not choice.
taunt_3: And I love all people -rich or poor-, but I those particular positions I just don't a poor person. Does that make sense?
taunt_4: We will begin the largest deportation operation in the history of the United States.
anger_1: And certainly I'm not proud of it, but that was something that ... happended.
anger_2: It's migrant crime. It's a new category of crime.
plead: The system is totally rigged and broken.
nervous_1: We're going to build a wall; it's going to be built.
nervous_2: I've been here like 51 days. Give me a chance.
victory_1: We will make America safe again!
victory_2: Bigger and better and stronger than ever before.
victory_3: We will make America great again!
victory_4: Total control. Bing bing, bong bong, bing bing bing!
request: We're dying! We're dying. We need money.
thanks: Thank you, Ohio! Thank you, thank you very much.
ally_death: The system is totally rigged and broken.
congrats: Look at him! Are you the greatest! Do you know what I'm talking about? Okay!

help: Listen, you gonna have to do a few thing. You gonna have to give me 28.000 soldiers.
extra: I like China. I just sold an apartment for 15.000.000$ to somebody from China.
siege: My fellow Americans, our movement is far from over. In fact, our fight has only just begun.
no_attack_1: This guy, this ... I mean he's like a maniac, okay? And you gotta give him credit.
no_help_1: Great question; it's not sustainable for our country.
no_help_2: I'm the president of the United States. I'm not the president of other countries.
no_sent: The worst trade deal ever made by any country, I think in the wolrd.
sent: Free trade can be wonderful, if you have smart people.
team_losing: We're competing in a rigged election; this is a rigged election.
team_winning: I will totally accept the results of this great and historic presidental election, if I win!
help_sent: And we're going to work really hard to get those people -that are so addicted- off the habit. We gonna work like hell to take care of this situation.
